column5: Hit Simcoe for a few hours today and boy did this cold front ever shut em down!! Marked fish but only a hand full were coaxed into hitting. Heres a pic of one of the lakers that I landed that was easy double digits in weight(size 11 snow boot as reference to size), sorry for bad pic but I was solo and wanted to send him back down the hole ASAP. All fish were caught in 77' off Long shoal using a small half half williams spoon. Ice conditions were great for sleds, ATVs and I did see a bunch of trucks out today.  Tight lines, RF
nice looking laker! Thanks for sharing.

nice thick , healthy ,  fish. solo pic's never really do the fish [ or fisherman ] justice. lol.  my best pike was photo'd solo. 39 inches, looked about 5lbs. flat on the ice next to the rod and reel.  what a joke .  feel your pain.  a guy about 1\3 amile away for a good pic wasn't worth losin' a great fish .  thanks for the report . tight lines .
Nice fish man! The fishing should pick up Friday (I am saying that because that's when I am heading out) :-)
Nice laker Rustic... we got a few whities today...  Sure was cold out there....
Beauty simcoe grey man !!!!!.  ..nice fish  cheers

I can see that Rossi wasn’t there to spoke those fish with his “erratic jigging technique”. Shouldn’t you be putting out a fire or something?? Anyways, see you Saturday. I think your closing with me.  P.S. Cactus Jack says hello
